andere-lab.title: andere lab
andere-lab.p:
Rooted in graphic design, identity, it began as a personal space - free from briefs and expectations - to explore ideas through form.
Over time, it evolved into a methodical lab for crafting visual systems: minimal, structured, and quietly expressive.

photo-gallery.title: Virtual Gallery of a Film Photographer
photo-gallery.p: When we set out to create this website, the goal was clear: not just to showcase stunning photography, but to build a digital space that feels like stepping into the photographer’s world.

raum-studio.title: RAUM STUDIO / R.S. / Architectural bureau
raum-studio.p: For the Berlin-based architecture firm RAUM STUDIO, we developed a new premium brand identity - one that directly communicates the studio’s values and speaks to its target audience.

xtrafit.title: XTRAFIT Gym
xtrafit.p: In this project, I carried out a redesign of the Xtrafit mobile application, which helps users improve their health and fitness results. The goal of the redesign was to enhance the user experience and visual design to make the app more intuitive, user-friendly, and aesthetically pleasing.

ace-and-tate.title: Ace & Tate
ace-and-tate.p: Revamped Ace and Tate's website with a fresh design, integrating user-friendly features across web and mobile. Prioritized clarity and ease of use while maintaining brand identity. Streamlined interface, enhancing browsing experience.

skills.title: Tools I Love
skills.p: Here I share the tools I use, along with a brief look at my skills, style, and approach to design.

graphic.title: Graphic Design
graphic.p: Developing scalable, cohesive visual elements that maintain a consistent and polished brand identity across various platforms and projects.

ux.title: UX Design
ux.p: Creating user experiences through research, user testing, and innovative design solutions.

systems.title: Design Systems
systems.p: Creating scalable, cohesive components that ensure consistent and efficient design across platforms and projects.

illustration.title: Illustration
illustration.p: Creative illustrations that enhance storytelling, add visual interest, and align with brand identity.

photography.title: Prototyping
photography.p: Building interactive prototypes to test ideas, gather feedback, and refine designs before final implementation.

typography.title: UI Design
typography.p: Designing visually appealing and intuitive interfaces that provide seamless interaction and elevate user engagement.

about.title: About
about.p1: Hi there! I'm Ivan, a UX/UI designer, graphic designer, and illustrator with extensive experience in creating unique and effective visual solutions. I specialize in making brands and products stand out by designing user-friendly interfaces that are both intuitive and eye-catching.
about.p2: I started my career in graphic design, crafting attractive logos and corporate identities for various companies. Over time, I shifted my focus to UX/UI design, where I design interfaces that are not only easy to use but also visually appealing. I'm also passionate about illustration, which allows me to express my creativity and inspiration through visual art.
about.p3: My goal is to not just complete projects, but to inspire my clients and users alike with each design I create.
